scripts.build-go: cd ~/dev/wowmate/services/common/migrate && go mod tidy && gofmt -w -s . && go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o main .  && cd ~/dev/wowmate/services/common/partition && go mod tidy && gofmt -w -s . && go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o main .  && cd ~/dev/wowmate/services/api/combatlogs/summaries/_combatlog-uuid/damage/get  &&  go mod tidy && gofmt -w -s . && go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o main . && cd ~/dev/wowmate/services/upload/convert/normalize && go test & cd ~/dev/wowmate/services/upload/convert && go test && go mod tidy && gofmt -w -s . && go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o main . && cd ~/dev/wowmate/services/upload/import && go mod tidy && gofmt -w -s . && go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o main . && cd ~/dev/wowmate/services/upload/summary && go mod tidy && gofmt -w -s . && go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o main .
scripts.build: cd ~/dev/wowmate && npm run build-go && cd services/upload/presign && npm install && cd ~/dev/wowmate && tsc
